Expansion performed internally based on codesystem ONC Observation Codes v0.1.0 (CodeSystem)

This value set contains 9 concepts

SystemCodeDisplay (en)DefinitionJSONXML
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-1Very FitRobus, active, energetic and motivated
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-2WellNo active disease symptoms but less fit than category 1
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-3Managing WellMedical problems are well controlled, but not regularly active
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-4VulnerableNot dependent for daily help, but symptoms limit activities
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-5Mildly FrailNeed help with high order IADLs (finances, transportation, heavy housework)
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-6Moderately FrailNeed help with all outside activities and some housekeeping
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-7Severely FrailCompletely dependent for personal care
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-8Very Severely FrailCompletely dependent, approaching end of life
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-9Terminally IllApproaching the end of life (life expectancy <6 months)

Expansion performed internally based on codesystem ONC Observation Codes v0.1.0 (CodeSystem)

This value set contains 5 concepts

SystemCodeDisplay (en)DefinitionJSONXML
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  empathy-1Low Empathy: Task-focused interaction with minimal person-centred engagement.Task-focused interaction with minimal person-centred engagement.
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  empathy-2Basic Empathy: Professional interaction with patient identity acknowledged.Professional interaction with patient identity acknowledged.
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  empathy-3Moderate Empathy: Active relational engagement with shared decision making.Active relational engagement with shared decision making.
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  empathy-4High Empathy: Authentic partnership with deep understanding of patient experience.Authentic partnership with deep understanding of patient experience.
https://opennursingcoreig.com/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  empathy-5Relational Excellence: Flourishing partnership with total alignment on 'What Matters to Me'.Flourishing partnership with total alignment on 'What Matters to Me'.

contains.display: Low Empathy: Task-focused interaction with minimal person-centred engagement.
Basic Empathy: Professional interaction with patient identity acknowledged.
Moderate Empathy: Active relational engagement with shared decision making.
High Empathy: Authentic partnership with deep understanding of patient experience.
Relational Excellence: Flourishing partnership with total alignment on 'What Matters to Me'.
